description: The AWS::DynamoDB::Table resource creates a DynamoDB table.

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DynamoDB table.

KeySchema.description: Specifies the attributes that make up the primary key for the table.

AttributeDefinitions.description: A list of attributes that describe the key schema for the table.

BillingMode.description: Specify how you are charged for read and write throughput.

SSESpecification.description: Specifies the settings to enable server-side encryption.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

KeySchema.description: Represents a single element of a key schema.

AttributeName.description: The name of a key attribute.

KeyType.description: The role that this key attribute will assume.

AttributeDefinition.description: Represents an attribute for describing the schema for the table.

AttributeType.description: The data type for the attribute.

SSESpecification.description: Represents the settings used to enable server-side encryption.

SSEEnabled.description: Indicates whether server-side encryption is done using an AWS managed key or a customer managed key.

KMSMasterKeyId.description: The KMS key that should be used for the KMS encryption.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.
